Source.Name: perl-file-sharedir
Source.Summary: Locate per-dist and per-module shared files
Source.Description: The intent of File::ShareDir is to provide a companion to Class::Inspector and File::HomeDir, modules that take a process that is well-known by advanced Perl developers but gets a little tricky, and make it more available to the larger Perl community.

Package.Name: perl-file-sharedir
